snippet: Dwyane Wade had two dunks during a game-changing run for the Heat that ended the 76ers’ four-game winning streak.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Miami Heat beat Philadelphia 76ers, 99-79; other NBA scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade had two dunks during a game-changing run for the Heat that ended the 76ers’ four-game winning streak.

headline.seo: Strong Finish by Wade and the Heat Derails the 76ers
headline.main: Strong Finish by Heat Ends 76ers’ Streak
headline.print_headline: Strong Finish By Heat Ends 76ers’ Streak
